document.full_text: europe will not let the euro fail and european union countries are committed to cutting deficits, the president of the european council told chinese officials on tuesday, seeking to ease fears that the euro zone crisis could imperil china's investments.
document.title: eu seeks to ease china's euro zone fears
lines_and_colors: europe will not let the euro fail and european union countries are committed to cutting deficits, the president of the european council told chinese officials on tuesday, seeking to ease fears that the euro zone crisis could imperil china's investments.
